hero.title: Let AI manage your ads
hero.subtitle: and attract more customers with ease.
hero.description: Launch your ads effortlessly across all major channels, watch them automatically optimize, and get the best results for your business.

noExperience.title: No experience or huge budget needed
noExperience.description: New to online advertising? Learn how Furriyadh helps you achieve your advertising goals without the high costs of traditional solutions.

campaigns.title: Create profitable ad campaigns in minutes
campaigns.highPerformanceDesc: Create your ad campaigns like major brands in minutes. Discover the power of automation.
campaigns.automation: Furriyadh does all the work for you.
campaigns.automationDesc: Furriyadh handles everything, from ad targeting and copywriting to creating ad materials.
campaigns.platforms: Publish on all major advertising platforms.
campaigns.platformsDesc: We support all major advertising platforms to bring you the best return on investment.

optimization.title: Get 24/7 optimization for your ads
optimization.description: Furriyadh will optimize your ads around the clock across all channels. From pausing unsuccessful keywords, creating new ads for A/B testing, or suggesting new targeting, Furriyadh covers it all.

dashboard.title: Stay in control with comprehensive dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor your ad campaign performance or import your current campaigns for a unified data source. Compare channels, campaigns, and ads at a glance.
dashboard.overviewDesc: Create your campaigns from the dashboard, manage them, and get an overview of their performance and channels.
dashboard.decisionsDesc: Monitor your campaign performance and get detailed insights about each one.

budget.title: Manage all budgets from one place
budget.description: With Furriyadh balance, you can manage budgets across all advertising platforms easily and earn additional credit with each spending operation.

integration.title: Import relevant assets with integration
integration.description: Integrate your various applications and synchronize all your valuable assets, such as email lists and product catalogs, to create profitable ads.

community.title: Join 20,000 small businesses on Furriyadh
community.description: Join our vibrant community and experience the difference. Open growth opportunities that help elevate your business to the next level.
